LanguageData.OE_MechRedline.label: redline
LanguageData.OE_MechRedline.description: Redline mode grant the Dominator an ability to increased combat potential and movespeed. Warning! It takes time to recover after use.
LanguageData.OE_MechRocketLauncher.label: rocket launcher
LanguageData.OE_MechRocketLauncher.description: Mounted rocket launcher grant the Dominator an ability launch a small explosive rocket at the target.
LanguageData.OE_MechChaos.label: chaos
LanguageData.OE_MechChaos.description: Chaos program grant the Dominator an ability to induce an angry psychosis in the multiple target's mind, causing them to attack anyone nearby.
LanguageData.OE_MechVanguard.label: vanguard
LanguageData.OE_MechVanguard.description: Vanguard program grant the Dominator an ability to reducing incoming damage with small reducing movespeed.
LanguageData.OE_MechBlink.label: blink
LanguageData.OE_MechBlink.description: Blink device grant the Dominator an ability to teleport the target to a desired position not too far from its starting point. Objects which are too large cannot be teleported.
LanguageData.OE_MechCamouflage.label: camouflage
LanguageData.OE_MechCamouflage.description: Camouflage device grant the Dominator an ability to activate the inner stealth module which renders the user invisible.
LanguageData.OE_MechProvoke.label: provoke
LanguageData.OE_MechProvoke.description: Provoke program grant the Dominator an ability to Attract multiple targets to approach the caster.
